website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option that proves a low price doesn't have to mean poor quality – offers features and craftsmanship that's just as good or better than its pricier competitors.
pros: Stands out for its low price, stable build, and near-effortless no-tool assembly
Some owners brag it took less than 5 minutes to put together
Both lightweight and strong, plus it looks good
cons: A few reports of missing pieces when it arrived
Several consumers commented that it would be more practical if it were taller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble, Sturdy, and Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: From opening the box to assembling it and placing the stand in a corner and putting my 32" TV on it required less than ten minutes. The parts are packaged securely and are well labeled, the instructions are simple and clear, and no tools were required. For the same price you'd pay for a beat up used TV stand from a thrift store this is a real bargain.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hentges

customer_reviews.title: Great little stand
customer_reviews.text: I got this to put my pet rats' cage on. It's super easy to assemble! Easiest piece of furniture I've ever assembled - maybe 10 minutes (tops) from opening the box and it was assembled. Instructions included, but it's so easy you could figure it out even without them. Box had a couple dings/scuffs, but the stand was well packaged and arrived with no damage. On sale for $26.99 this was a great value! Of course, would also work well as a TV stand. Perfect if you are looking for a simple, but good looking stand for a smaller TV. Rated for up to 32" TV but could probably go up to 40".
customer_reviews.author: Bluestraycat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV stand and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this TV stand for 5 years now and it's still going strong. It's survived several moves in that time and is still as sturdy as it was day one. It's excellent for people who constantly move like myself since it's very easy to assemble/disassemble and is not very bulky. I recently lost the feet to these TV stands and contacted their support. There was no hassle and they quickly provided me replacements free of charge. Definitely a great product and a company to back it up.
customer_reviews.author: mhnstp

customer_reviews.title: not the size i thought it was
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this table in brown over 2 years ago. when I decided to order it again there was no indication that it was much smaller size the first one was larger much and I was very happy with it. but as I took this one out of the box I saw it was much smaller. I feel the seller should indicated size difference. I am keeping cause it is easier than packing it up and sending back. but that size was not what I expected I am very disappointed in that
customer_reviews.author: stephine

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, easy assembly and looks good enough
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Under 20 minute assembly. Sturdy (Got 60 pounds of stuff on it with no problem). Looks good enough (Trust me, it doesn't look like it's 20 bucks and change). Cons: The finish of materials could be better (Good for the price though). My 55 inch TV weighs 40 pounds, custom stand weighs in at 11 pounds, Xbox One S, plus other gadgets makes it about 60 pounds of load in total. This stand hardly moves even when I push it with force. You really couldn't ask more for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Col J.

customer_reviews.title: and want something sturdy enough for a tv and some consoles
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought a lot of cheap furniture in my life. But hands down this was the easiest TV stand I’ve ever put together. First and foremost, this isn’t a peice of art. However if you’re looking for function, the stand is stable, doesn’t wiggle or wobble. Personally I’m using it in my office and it works for me. It took me 5 minutes to assemble the whole thing. No allen wrench, or wierd teeth plastic peices. The whole thing is basically just giant screw on tubes you do by hand. If you don’t want to spend an afternoon putting together a TV stand, and want something sturdy enough for a tv and some consoles, this one is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Finkledinkle

customer_reviews.title: Great but only for 32” flat screen TVs
customer_reviews.text: Pro: The easiest set up in the world! Love this. The product itself looks great for the price point. Con: Only holds a 32” flat screen TV; which was misleading on the product page. I needed one for a 55” and specifically checked on product page and QnA section. Due to the misleading product page detail, rating it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppersmeow

customer_reviews.title: Almost Ideal Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. The faux black wood isn't too bad, and the metal-finish poles are great. The only downside is possibly avoidable -- One of the larger black boards has a gunky label that's just about impossible to remove. (One of =those=.) But if you catch it soon enough (which I didn't) and put it on the bottom of the first board, facing the floor, you won't need to worry about it.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have found this TV stand years ago. Assembly was extremely easy (took about 3 minutes) and gives me more space to add more furniture. I love the very slick and modern design My only complaints are that it kind of sits real low to the floor, more height would have made it more awesome and the top surface is very smooth so the base of the TV slides real easy. Perfect for children but not too bad at all for adults if you are looking to save space around the room.
customer_reviews.author: De'Jonal

customer_reviews.title: NICE LOOK. STUDY AND GOOD PRICE
customer_reviews.text: LIKES: LOOK. EASY ASSEMBLY WITHIN AN HOUR BY ONE SENOR CITIZEN WITH RESTRICTED MOVEMENTS AND HAND USE. VERY AFFORDABLE AND REASONABLE PRICE. SIZE NEITHER BIG NOR SMALL. ROOM FOR 32" TV, BLU RAY PLAYER, DVD PLAYER, VCR, LASER DISC PLAYER, MODERATE SIZE SPEAKERS. STURDY AND RIGID/STABLE WHEN FIXED.
customer_reviews.author: SRIPATHY

customer_reviews.title: Simple to assemble TV stand
customer_reviews.text: TV stand was assembled within an hour. It was a replacement for another identical stand which had broken after about 3 years of use. Supports a light weight flat screen 32 " TV. I wish it had another shelf for additional height.
customer_reviews.author: phoenix53

customer_reviews.title: Small, sleek stand with good storage
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small stand that provided good storage. This stand works great! Easily holds my TV, speakers, hard drives, and some DVDs. Love the sleek, modern design. And it was very simple to put together. A good buy for the price. I also purchased the Convenience Concepts Designs2Go Single Tier TV Swivel Board to go with it. They work perfectly together. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Nerd alert

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic Parts
customer_reviews.text: Parts to assemble are cheap plastic & pieces broke on my husband before we could get the 3rd tier up. Did not receive refund or replacement.I’ll never purchase from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Sheronda D.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice TV stand!
customer_reviews.text: Put it together in about 5-10 min. Feels extremely sturdy. Fits my soundbar and 32 inch TV nicely. I can’t believe the price I paid was so reasonable & affordable. You will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great little stand
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mother who just entered a nursing home. I was looking for something that we could put her tv on that also had some shelves for her small ceramic dog collection. This fit the bill perfectly. It was super easy to put together. We ended up putting her tv on a dresser so she now uses this just for her personal things and everything displays nicely. It is not a big stand, so perfect for a smaller space. Seems sturdy and doesn't look cheap. I would recommend this for anyone looking for an inexpensive, practical solution for a smaller tv, or even just for some attractive shelving.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Wow, really impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Like many of the customers posting here, I wasn't expecting much from this TV stand. I had a pretty small budget to work with and just needed a mounting/stand solution for a new 32" television I got for Christmas. The TV stand arrived promptly, and as soon as I started pulling pieces out of the box I was stoked - the metal components all looked very nice, and the wood was really nice with an attractive, dark finish. Putting it together was a breeze, maybe 10 minutes total, and the stand looks awesome in our room. It's very modern and is perfect for putting a DVD player or game console and some DVD's or games.
customer_reviews.author: Catcher of Pokemon (Like No One Ever Was)

customer_reviews.title: Small, convenient, and it looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this purchase. My room is small, 10x10, and I needed something to put my tv on, as well as store my laptop, dvd's and video games. I couldn't have asked for a better entertainment stand. It's exactly as advertised. I put this together in 10 minutes by myself. The directions are straight forward and show you exactly how to put the entertainment stand together. I absolutely love my little entertainment stand, and doesn't take up much space in my already small room. This product is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: A Great Purchase !!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a television for my bedroom and needed a table. Most were priced between $300-400.00. I turned to Amazon and found this beauty. What a great purchase. The table is very attractive, sturdy and quite easy to assemble. I couldn't be happier with this purchase. It fits my 32" TV quite easily. If you need a table quite similar to this. Buy it !! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV stand for an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a budget TV stand, this one's for you. I needed a basic TV stand for my son's room so I gave this one a shot. It's made of wood and sturdy metal poles. Very stable. Even comes with hooks and zip ties to secure it to the wall to prevent any accidental knock-overs. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Valdes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, Glad i bought this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 32inch tv (50inch now), Ps3, and Wii (Wii U now). This is stand looks amazing and doesn't take up that much space. Pros Cheap (got it for $25) Stylish look Easy set-up Holds up more than 32inch. (Currently have 50inch Lg Tv, Ps3, Wii U, and some random stuff on it) A lot of room on both shelves to fit many things. Cons *Not a con, but i wished it had a couple of more colors schemes* Notes- Changed from carpet to wood floors and theres no dents or damages to the wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: John Cao

customer_reviews.title: Perfect TV stand.
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for us. Use with a 32" TV and would take a larger one easily. It has a rich appearance to it. Would recommend it to anyone needing a TV stand. Was extremely easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann

customer_reviews.title: Currently Own 2, About To Make It 3
customer_reviews.text: I currently have two and I just love them because not only are they a convient price, but they're also durable and sturdy. Nothing cheap at all. I've even sat on one and it held me up and I'm weighing in at almost 200lbs! Very nice product. Not to mention the first one I bought, I've had it for about 3 or 4 year, the latest one has been about a year and now I'm getting ready to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Darius Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice Stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking stand/shelving unit. It was easy to put together (no tools required) and it seems pretty sturdy. My 32" tv looks great on it, with no fear that the stand might tip over. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: RomanStJames

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, nice stand!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stand for a 40" flat screen TV and it works perfect! Not only is it strong and sturdy, it looks great! I never knew how much I could save buying off the Amazon Warehouse instead of just Amazon. The box was damaged but the item was perfect and I saved about $20! Great deal and great product!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Now that was easy!
customer_reviews.text: As with all "some assembly required" items I waited a little after receiving it to bother to put it together. That was silly since it ended up taking about 10 minutes with no tools required. When I was done I was surprised by how good it looked and how solid it is. This is a TV stand for my etra room and I am impressed both in look and ease of assembly.
customer_reviews.author: SDAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when lifting.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this TV stand for five years and i really like it. Only problem I've had with it is its slowly falling apart the more i move it. I've noticed the black pieces holding the poles in crack, the poles its self are separating from the the wood. Its light weight but if you are going to move it around, i suggest picking it up from the base.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it was Samsung 32” Inch TV. Sturdy, smooth, shiny & super easy to assemble. Love how decent & compact it looks in the room. I think the metal pipes might eventually rust or get spots but you can just spray paint it. Totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Samia Haseeb

customer_reviews.title: No tools necessary
customer_reviews.text: BRILLIANT!!! That is what my 21 year old daughter said about the designer of this product. I watched her take this product out of the box and lay all the pieces out(all 18 of them) and look confused. She figured there had to be more, but in less than 5 minutes, she had the product completely assembled. She said that the designer was brilliant and deserved an award for simplistic design. The rods thread directly into the shelves and the end caps hold it all together: NO TOOLS NECESSARY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I like this TV table. It was easy to assemble. The legs are steel. There are no wheels. It is a little difficult to move. It does the job, unless you have to move it.
customer_reviews.author: henry Stern

customer_reviews.title: Cant complain!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, looks like the pictures and is holding up a older very heavy tv like a champ. Have nothing to complain about this thing. Would def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JSpring

customer_reviews.title: May not fit TVs your tv.
customer_reviews.text: For the price a good value. But my 43 inch tv barely fits. Front legs need to be taped up so they would not accidentally slide off.
customer_reviews.author: Louis M Bizzari

customer_reviews.title: The Holder of My Goods
customer_reviews.text: This stand is perfect! For the price, easy assembly and juust the right width for my room and tv. It can hold my PS3 , Xbox One and Xbox360 on the side. and of course some action figures. Its going through remodeling at the moment. But yes I suggest buying this especially if you want to save on space!
customer_reviews.author: StormTrooper5

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly sturdy and easy to set up, but some parts are made of very cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly sturdy, holds my 32 inch TV and 2 game consoles without a problem. Extremely easy to set up, you just screw the legs into the shelves. It seemed like one small little mistake while putting it together might have easily broken something because the thread on the screwing part of the legs is made of cheap plastic, but luckily nothing broke. For a simple TV stand, this is very sturdy and takes less than 5 minutes and very little effort to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: The good points about this TV stand are the low cost and the easiest possible assembly. No tools needed! I was done in under 10 minutes and I am terrible at assembling things. On the negative side, it is not particularly attractive. Not ugly but just very plain. The quality of materials is rather doubtful. The support rods are not stainless steel, just look like it, probably plastic. Panels look like black painted wood but not sure what material it is. Bottom line? It does the job. For the low price I paid, one should not expect much more.
customer_reviews.author: Fauzia Iqbal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a small apartment. Put it together in like 5 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Vito Corleone

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new tv stand pronto, so I ordered this one, got it in 2 days. I had it unwrapped, and put together in 15 minutes, and that is the easiest thing I have ever put together. my 19 inch tv is on it while I get my upgraded 32 inch this week. My Dvr fits great on the second shelf, and I put my router and phone stuff on the bottom shelf. Once I cleaned it up, it was a nice sleek looking black. Not bad for the low price I paid. Perfect what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Lori R

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together (took me maybe 5 minutes). Very sturdy, my 32 inch tv fits perfectly. A+ buy
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This stand was surprisingly sturdy and well made. The shelves are not cheap pressed "wood" product; they are heavy. The entire unit Is fairly good quality, especially for the price. The only parts that are lower quality and cheaply made are the end caps on top of the unit and the little feet on the bottom. It is very easy and quick to assemble even for 1 person. The wood shelves are true black, not a black/brown. Don't put anything at the back of the bottom shelf. It is quite difficult to reach.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Rutland

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product! It's perfect for a kids room, very strong & made well. I actually wish they made a higher, larger version for my living room one that would hold a 55" TV. Anyway this was very easy to assemble, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great TV Stand!!
customer_reviews.text: The main problem I have when shopping for furniture like this is, will it be easy to assemble. The answer for this product is yes, it is easy. It is pnly 4 steps to set the whole thing up. Most of the parts just screw in. It is also very sturdy and is a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Speedy Andy

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is really good for such an inexpensive price. It doesn’t take up a lot of room and it fits my 32 inch tv and both of my consoles.
customer_reviews.author: J last

customer_reviews.title: Great stand for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stand for the price. I purchased it because I needed a simple, functional TV stand for a secondary TV, and I wanted shelving to hold a game system and some other small stuff. This stand was very easy to put together, and I think it looks great! It seems very sturdy on our carpet, and the shelves work perfectly for storing the additional items I have. If you're looking for an inexpensive, good-looking, easy TV stand, I would highly recommend this stand!
customer_reviews.author: Solivagant Lily

customer_reviews.title: Cute and small
customer_reviews.text: It's small but perfect for my living room since it's such a small area. Fits a 32" TV on it perfectly. Super easy to put together. Over all I love it. Could have some issues with storage but for now it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to put together- you just twist the bars together- ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted a cheap TV stand- I read other peoples reviews and thought it would do. I was as pleasantly surprised as all the other people that purchased this. It was very easy to put together- you just twist the bars together- it was very fast assembly. The shelves look great- much better quality than the cheap stuff I was looking at in walmart and target. Its also very sturdy- I have the 32" tv on it, along with a dvd player- my cable tuner , my Roku and a sound bar. Great little TV shelf!!
customer_reviews.author: katbee

customer_reviews.title: Great TV Stand!
customer_reviews.text: This stand was so easy to put together that I, a 53 year old grandmother, was able to do it all by myself! It doesn't even require any tools! It looks pretty good too. I got it for my bedroom which is very small so I needed something that didn't take up much space yet was able to hold my 40" tv and this worked just great.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, looks nice and modern and sleek
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, looks nice and modern and sleek. The box was heavy and kind of awkward to carry, but it only took me ten minutes--if that--to put together by myself. My TV sits on the top shelf with my clock, my PS4 sits on the middle shelf, and my cat sleeps on the bottom shelf. lol
customer_reviews.author: Aquiel

customer_reviews.title: BETTER  THEN Mainstays
customer_reviews.text: Easy as pie to put together. This is a MUCH BETTER Product then you would get at that go to Mart we all surely know. Only fits 50 inch tv or bigger with center stand .
customer_reviews.author: Jeep Chef

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT ITS GOOD
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT FOR THE PRICE. if you go to your local furniture store, it will perobably cost you at least 30 dollars more to get something very similar. if you are in a small room, and have tv from 32-42 inch this is perfect. mine is holding a 32 inch led, under that, all the cable, and internet routers and stuff, blue ray/dvd player, a small ipod dock, and two laptops i store there and a ipad i store. its working perfectly and took me only 10 minutes to assemble. what else do you want in that price!
customer_reviews.author: Mahbubul Maruf

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Wouldve given it 5 stars if there weren't a couple Mark's in the wood as soon as I took it out but other than that exactly what I paid for and VERY easy to put together. Might buy another one to add on top.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It’s functional
customer_reviews.text: I can say it’s functional easy to put together advertising said a 32” TV would sit on it my new flat screen barely does but it’s in den with carpeting so it should be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian W. Mouzon

customer_reviews.title: Impressive.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted. Cheap, sturdy and looks good in my space. It is small but sturdy. I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sonju

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. I bought it for a small TV in a one bedroom apartment. Assembly could not have been easier. It's nothing fancy but it does the job. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Autumnkat

customer_reviews.title: The thing goes together to quick and easy. Very sturdy and good-looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons 50" flat screen. The thing goes together to quick and easy. Very sturdy and good-looking. Great price and great quality. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, sturdy, and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. It's sturdy and took less than 5 minutes to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: HKS

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.text: This was a successful purchase. The black wood has a nice shine to it and the finished wood is smooth to the touch. It's complete build is sturdy and solid standing and it looks very contemporary as an "must have" tv stand with limited space! My daughter is buying one soon. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: It came in one day, was easy to assemble and is very sturdy for our 32 inch TV. It is great for the price and does not look cheap. Would buy it again if I needed another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. It arrived with minor damages. But I'm too lazy to send it back because I sorta expected. They're not visible when I assembled and they're not major so I don't worry about it. Whenever you purchase furniture online, it's extremely difficult to find one without a single scratch. Usually, unless for something major I don't bother with it. As for the actual item, I use it on my bedroom for my 32" TV. It's a bit shorter for my experience, but sturdy. At that time, I paid $40, which is not a bad deal for this stand.
customer_reviews.author: Soul Reaper

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble. Fit in small room to hold TV and gaming systems.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smyke

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this small TV stand for my 5 year old's bedroom. It only took me about 15 minutes to put together, which blew my mind! The TV stand is very sturdy, it's a GREAT deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lyell

customer_reviews.title: Great stand at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? This TV stand is everything I was looking for ; Cheap, sturdy and fast assembly! It met all my checklist points and its still as sturdy as the first day i got it. I currently have a 32" Samsung TV on top, PS3 right under it and if you want, you can put either a receiver or a printer on the bottom. Book shelf spearkers do fit on the side and the stand doesnt take that much space. I am 100% satisified with this stand.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised considering the cost
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleasantly surprised with this product. It arrived with some minor packing damage, but the product was in tact and not affected by the packaging damage. Assembly was very simple and quick. Product looks inexpensive, but guess what, less than $40 is pretty inexpensive. Does exactly the job we need it for - hold a few components (DVD player,set top cable box) under a wall mounted 55" LCD which was on the TV stand for a few days without too much concerns of strain. Could recomend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thing because I was in the process of getting my first flatscreen television. I'm very much into the sleek look of black and silver furniture and I have several gaming consoles, so this was exactly what I needed. I have a stereo receiver on the bottom, my PS2 and XBOX 360 in the center and the tv on top and it looks amazing. The set up was simple, took maybe 10 minutes tops, no tools required. It doesn't wobble, it looks and feels sturdy and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by how nice this looks. Very sturdy and nice to look at. I put it in my kitchen where it holds the tv, router, and everything needed for the tv.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: This stand is soo easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This stand is soo easy to assemble. I wanted a tv stand which would not need lot of tools to assemble. This was perfect!! And the price was perfect too. My TV is 46 inches and i did not want to spend a lot on tv stand. I searched tv stands that 46 inch tv required, but they were costing more then $100. This tv stand worked fine for me. and there is enough space to keep my laptop, and HD device and more! Overall im happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Deepa

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Truly this was one of the most easiest pieces of furniture I have ever put together. You don't need any tools whatsoever. It's very sturdy, it's chic, it's functional, and doesn't take up hardly any space. I highly, highly, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Solid Stand
customer_reviews.text: This stand is great. It is not made out of pressed wood. Very solid. A snap to put together. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble, no tools required. Light weight, but sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these, one in cherry and this one in black. Looks much better than its bargain price tag might indicate, took less than five minutes to put together. Used for 32" TVs, which might be this stand's design maximum, nevertheless they are secure and fit well. Piece seems quite sturdy, handing multiple components with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Steve792

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good size
customer_reviews.text: Love this table and came with no damage. Able to put light stuff on it and my tv on it
customer_reviews.author: J32

customer_reviews.title: T.V. stand
customer_reviews.text: We needed a small t.v. stand and found exactly what we needed in this product. When it arrived it was so easy to assemble that I put in together in just a few minutes. We were searching in stores for a t.v. stand and were very disappointed in what we saw. Everything was expensive and very poorly designed. This product is inexpensive but does not look cheap. It is very sturdy and fits perfectly in a small space. It has plenty of room to fit the cable box and a dvd player.
customer_reviews.author: RoeB

customer_reviews.title: Great and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Using for my 50" TH Panasonic plasma. The HEAVY one from 2006. I had little room for a big entertainment center, and this fits the bill perfectly, and looks good to boot! Very, very simple to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Rample

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs, super easy to build
customer_reviews.text: - Price was very reasonable for what you get - One of the easiest pieces of furniture I ever had to assemble. - My 28 inch TV fits real nicely on the stand - I have plenty of room for my DVD player, Wii, VCR player, and I have an LP turntable on the bottom shelf. - I have a 6 month old son, so we may regret not buying a more expensive one with cabinets... I recommend, if you are looking for an inexpensive TV stand, that gets the job done, to buy this...
customer_reviews.author: iloveamazon

customer_reviews.title: Seven Minutes to Assemble - No Tools Necessary.
customer_reviews.text: This TV stand was received as advertised. It was the perfect size for by 24 inch TV. It took seven minutes to assemble and all the parts simply screwed together no tools necessary. It is sturdy and attractive. However, the color appears black.
customer_reviews.author: N. Butler

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on 03/04 and got it 03/06! Super fast shipping. So so SO easy to assemble, took me maybe 10 minutes. Not as small as some of the reviews said, it will be perfect for my bedroom! Will definitely buy again in the future!!
customer_reviews.author: ceirra

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Stand!
customer_reviews.text: At 30 bucks I found it too good to be true. A tv stand for 30 bucks with no tools required? Yep! It took me about 10-20 minutes to install, without tools, and it is pretty sturdy and looks great. Perfect for a dorm room which I'm using it for. I have a 20 inch tv on top, with a PS4 on middle shelf and still sturdy and looks great! I recommend this product fully.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Mancini

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Easy to put together and the perfect size for the space I wanted it in. Very sturdy and plenty of space. I will be ordering another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Briyana McIntire

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product well TV stand of course it’s the ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product well TV stand of course it’s the perfect size it fits exactly how I wanted it I mean it couldn’t of been a little longer by laugh but is perfect exactly what I wanted as well as the colors thanks very much
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: It's mostly all good, slightly low in height.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, super easy to assemble and sturdy. Its a little bigger than an end table. I think it is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've used this stand for a few years now and have had no problems. It's pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenience Concepts 131020 3-Tier TV Stand for Flat Panel TV's up to... Review
customer_reviews.text: This little stand was easy to assemble and not too heavy to move around. I had another similar to it for another room. One of the stand levels was cracked and damaged but the seller was very accommodating and the problem was resolved quickly and to my satisfaction. The surface was easy-clean with simple cleanser and water. It fit nicely into snug spaces as well. Pricing was right, delivery was fast, and packaging was secure.
customer_reviews.author: Dwranny

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Simple, attractive TV stand. Easily put together, fairly sturdy, provides some storage space - but not a lot. Likely to last if used as intended but probably could not handle much misuse such as an adult sitting on it, or being constantly moved about. Personally, I wish that the middle "tier" was same width as others for a bit more storage area.
customer_reviews.author: Zoaster

customer_reviews.title: This Stand is perfect for what I needed it for
customer_reviews.text: This Stand is perfect for what I needed it for. I have my 39 inch TV on top room for my digital cable adaptor and stream box, my VCR/DVD player in the middle and on the bottom silver radio which matches it. It looks great put together in 5 minutes. Adds a nice touch to bedroom. The only negative which is not a big deal the wires in the back are visible for your TV. cable etc but it looks really nice so glad I got it great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my home office / she-space. It’s a perfect addition. Took less than 10 minutes to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke while assembling
customer_reviews.text: Was putting it together and was tightening the last leg and the whole screw in part broke off kinda annoying
customer_reviews.author: Adrianarose11

customer_reviews.title: Great stand and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Great stand and easy to put together. Fits my 40" Vizio perfectly. Docked a star because the bottom wood panel came damaged (chipped wood in the front). I colored it in w/a black sharpie to make it less noticeable. Disappointing that it came damaged but still happy w/the set-up and quality of the panels.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Yim

customer_reviews.title: Hooray for cheap foreign labor!!!
customer_reviews.text: Since my old TV in the bedroom has a center pedistal, I had to get a new table to support a tv with the legs on the side of the tv. So, I purchased this table to hold my new 32" TCL Roku TV. I couldn't believe how nice it looks for so cheap. I was able to build the table in under 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jon K

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: In total, it took about 10-minutes to assemble, minimal instructions, but none really needed. The only thing that needs work is the way that the "end caps" are packaged, as one of them came chipped. I also don't like the end caps are these bright silver pieces that stand out like a sore thumb. But I spray-painted them black and you don't even notice the chip now.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Scoggs

customer_reviews.title: This stand is perfect. It's small enough to fit well in a ...
customer_reviews.text: This stand is perfect. It's small enough to fit well in a corner, but big and sturdy enough to hold the TV. It's a very simple design ,and was easy to put together. It's exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed for flat screen TV in bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Not hard to put together, is sturdy and looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: Southern gent

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy shelf! My son uses his PSI game on it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandee

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, Attractive and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I Love it so nice in my small livingroom it fits my 43 inch TV perfectly. Very easy to put together even for newbies like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: In terms of how it looks it is just so-so. Don't expect too much. But it was super easy to assemble and does the job right.
customer_reviews.author: amazonbuyerseller

customer_reviews.title: Not the prettiest, but a great deal and does what I need
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my 37 inch TV in my bedroom. My TV exceeds the recommended size, however I have not had any stability issues so far. That being said, I wouldn't put a TV much larger than 37 inches on this particular model. The stand was very easy to put together, and I had no issues following directions. The multi-level shelves are a nice option for storage. I compared it to many other TV stands, and I think that this may be the best quality for this price. It's not the most attractive thing in the world, but it was a good deal and I'm ultimately pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jinny N Nordquist

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and came a day earlier than expected! Does fit perfect on a 32 inch tv with the tv stand installed also
customer_reviews.author: Moses

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Upon putting it together one of the cheap screw in pieces completely broke making it useless I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Compact
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it is quite compact and doesn't take up too much space. I have a small bedroom.so it's nice to have something that is beautiful and compact. It is very sturdy for a product that you put together without tools and in <15mins!
customer_reviews.author: Eniola

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This came in on time and when I opened it up and put it together it exceeded my expectations. Easy to assemble, quick to set up and it is very durable. I would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & functional
customer_reviews.text: This is the best TV stand I've seen and I've seen a lot of them!! My 32" TV sits comfortably on it and there's ample space to accomodate my printer, modem, Roku box, 2 spike guards and still have space left on the middle shelf. Assembly took roughly about 3 minutes and the stand looks very stylish. I purchased it from Amazon because it had the best price and fastest delivery. As usual - Amazon didn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then it looks in photos
customer_reviews.text: We have a 32 inch. It barely looks right. It is cute and sturdy. Very easy to assemble took about 10 mins. But it is shorter width and height then I thought it would be. I measured it width is 31.5 inches (top shelf) and height (ground up.) is 21.5 inches. I was expecting about 5 more inches both ways so it small but attractive and strong. We are able to put a dvr , wii, and dvd player on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sugar & Spice

customer_reviews.title: Great little TV stand
customer_reviews.text: I know this says it's for smaller TVs, but I bought it for my 40" in my bedroom and it works great. It's sturdy and easy to assemble. The TV is just about as wide as the table. Great for small spaces, this fits at the end of my bed with plenty of room to walk in front of it around the bed. Also it's the perfect height for watching from my bed.
customer_reviews.author: amc623

product_meta.title: Convenience Concepts Designs2Go 3-Tier TV Stand, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackOptimize your space with the Designs2Go 3 Tier TV Stand from Convenience Concepts. Its open concept design and contemporary style will fit perfectly in your living room or home study. This furniture piece features three ample tiers that provide enough space for all your entertainment essentials. Fashioned from shelves made of particle board and melamine, stainless steel poles and plastic feet, this TV stand was engineered to endure the test of time. Enjoy your favorite shows in no time with its quick and easy 4-step assembly. The Designs2Go 3 Tier TV Stand is available in multiple color finishes. This TV stand is the furniture piece you have been looking for to modernize any room in your home. Look for additional pieces from the Designs2Go Collection from Convenience Concepts; each sold separately.
feature_bullets: Showcases a contemporary style to update any home decor
Quick and easy assembly requiring only 4 steps
Part of Designs2Go Collection from Convenience Concepts
